Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Conditions.Description: A judgment of a court or tribunal or any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data may only be recognized or enforceable if it meets certain conditions.
Conditions.Condition: Must be based on an international agreement such as a mutual legal assistance treaty.

Conditions.Description: Such agreement must be in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State.

Content.Disclaimer: This is without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
